name: Pendulum (hi2398)
description:
You are a detective looking for clues on a murder case in a local shipyard warehouse.

Upon arriving you notice, that something's not right...

A demonic monster is chasing you, but through unexplainable circumstances you hijack the monster's mind every now and then. The monster is the threat, but also your ally.

Can you escape before it kills you?


This little project has been created in 48 hours for the global game jam. Our team consisted of 7 members each focusing on different parts of the project. It has been really fun to work with another in a room and create a quite funny experience in such a short time.

We created this Game in Unreal Engine 4.27.2. and created all 3D assets by hand in Blender. The game uses a post process shader to give the old PS1 vibes.

We hope you like it as well!

Controls: WASD - Moving

Mouse - Look Around

Space - Jump

C - Crouch

F - Interact/Attack
